name: EmanciNation
description:
Decide how the budget of a fictitious city will be spent. In this collective voting game, the consequences of participants' choices are presented in real time. An infographic with all the data voted during the game will be generated at the end of the session.

 Emancination also allows users to create their own games. The software was developed during Game Jam: Art, Politics, and Digital Games 2017, which took place from June 23 to 25 at the Goethe-Institut São Paulo.
